#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

static int volatile x1 =
    MarshallDeputy::RegInitializer(MarshallDeputy::CMD_MULTI_STRING,
                                     [] () -> Marshallable* {
                                       return new MultiStringMarshallable;
                                     });



int64_t KvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}

bool KvServer::Start(shared_ptr<MultiStringMarshallable> cmd) {
    RaftServer *raft = &GetRaftServer();
    DEFER_LOCK(raft->mtx_);
    uint64_t dummy1, dummy2;
    return raft->Start((shared_ptr<janus::Marshallable> &)cmd, &dummy1, &dummy2);
}

#define RAFT_TIMEOUT (ELECTION_TIMEOUT + 200*1000 + 200*1000)
int KvServer::Put(const uint64_t& op_id, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
  /* 
  Your are recommended to use MultiStringMarshallable as the format 
  for the log entries. Here is an example how you can use it. */

    /* your code here */
    Log_debug("put called");

    auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    string transaction_id = to_string(op_id);
    s->data_.push_back(transaction_id);
    s->data_.push_back("put");
    s->data_.push_back(k);
    s->data_.push_back(v);

    // create event and insert into event tracker
    auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
    if (transaction_event_tracker.find(transaction_id) !=
            transaction_event_tracker.end()) {
        Log_info("XXX Duplicate transaction id!!!!!! DEBUG THIS!!!!!");
    } else {
        transaction_event_tracker[transaction_id] = make_pair(ev, "");
    }

    if (Start(s) == false) {
        // remove transaction id from tracker
        // I am not the leader
        return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }
    Log_info("Setting timer for put event");
    // set event wait
    transaction_event_tracker[transaction_id].first->Wait(RAFT_TIMEOUT); // 100 ms wait?



    if (transaction_event_tracker[transaction_id].first->status_ == Event::TIMEOUT) {
        return KV_TIMEOUT;
    }

  return KV_SUCCESS;
}

int KvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
  /* your code here */
    Log_debug("append called");

    auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    string transaction_id = to_string(oid);
    s->data_.push_back(transaction_id);
    s->data_.push_back("append");
    s->data_.push_back(k);
    s->data_.push_back(v);

    // create event and insert into event tracker
    auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
    if (transaction_event_tracker.find(transaction_id) !=
            transaction_event_tracker.end()) {
        Log_info("XXX Duplicate transaction id!!!!!! DEBUG THIS!!!!!");
    } else {
        transaction_event_tracker[transaction_id] = make_pair(ev, "");
    }

    if (Start(s) == false) {
        // remove transaction id from tracker
        // I am not the leader
        return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }

    // set event wait
    transaction_event_tracker[transaction_id].first->Wait(RAFT_TIMEOUT); // 100 ms wait?

    if (transaction_event_tracker[transaction_id].first->status_ == Event::TIMEOUT) {
        return KV_TIMEOUT;
    }

  return KV_SUCCESS;
}

int KvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
  /* your code here */
    Log_info("get called");

    auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    string transaction_id = to_string(oid);
    s->data_.push_back(transaction_id);
    s->data_.push_back("get");
    s->data_.push_back(k);

    // create event and insert into event tracker
    auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
    if (transaction_event_tracker.find(transaction_id) !=
            transaction_event_tracker.end()) {
        Log_info("XXX Duplicate transaction id!!!!!! DEBUG THIS!!!!!");
    } else {
        transaction_event_tracker[transaction_id] = make_pair(ev, "");
    }

    if (Start(s) == false) {
        // remove transaction id from tracker
        // I am not the leader
        return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }

    // set event wait
    transaction_event_tracker[transaction_id].first->Wait(RAFT_TIMEOUT); // 100 ms wait?

    if (transaction_event_tracker[transaction_id].first->status_ == Event::TIMEOUT) {
        return KV_TIMEOUT;
    }

    *v = transaction_event_tracker[transaction_id].second;

    return KV_SUCCESS;
}

void KvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
  auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  /* your code here */
    string transaction_id = v->data_[0];
    string transaction_type = v->data_[1];

    if (transaction_type == "get") {
        string key = v->data_[2];
        if (transaction_event_tracker.find(transaction_id) !=
            transaction_event_tracker.end()) {
            // get the value from kvStore and set it in the tracker
            transaction_event_tracker[transaction_id].second = kvStore[key];
        }
    } else {
        string key = v->data_[2];
        string val = v->data_[3];
        if (transaction_type == "append") {
            kvStore[key] = kvStore[key] + val;
        } else {
            kvStore[key] = val;
        }
    }

    if (transaction_event_tracker.find(transaction_id) !=
            transaction_event_tracker.end()) {
        transaction_event_tracker[transaction_id].first->Set(1);
    }
}

shared_ptr<KvClient> KvServer::CreateClient() {
  /* don't change this function */
  auto cli = make_shared<KvClient>();
  verify(commo_ != nullptr);
  cli->commo_ = commo_;
  uint32_t id = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  id = id << 16;
  cli->cli_id_ = id+cli_cnt_++; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
